name: crag-compass
description: Crag Compass is an innovative web application designed to assist climbers in discovering new climbing locations and crags around the world. It offers an intuitive interface that enables users to easily search for climbing spots based on their preferences, including location, difficulty level, weather and type of climbing (such as bouldering, sport climbing, or traditional climbing). Whether you're a seasoned climber looking for a new challenge or a beginner eager to explore the climbing world, Crag Compass is your go-to resource for finding the perfect crag.
